options.content:
Flow Data for Projects

This dashboard shows a summary of flow information for a selected project.
Please note that flows with either end tagged as part of the project are included
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: (meta.scireg.src.project_names:$project_type OR meta.scireg.dst.project_names:$project_type) AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

(meta.scireg.src.project_names:$project_type OR meta.scireg.dst.project_names:$project_type) AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

(meta.scireg.src.project_names:$project_type OR meta.scireg.dst.project_names:$project_type) AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)
